column4: how do i tell if the correct module is installed for my soundcard? the livecd didnt work with sound either
they have a script to give them a readout of the sound onboard  so check in the topic to see fi there is a link for that script
I would hold on until someone answers though

couple things  guy  first   you need to calm down just a bit :)  then understand not all cards are recognized in linux   and also that no one here apparenlty has the ability to troubleshoot this at this particular time of the day
at some point someone in alsa will be available honest
when you run  gstreamer-properties   for Default Output what is listed there?
ok and under that pull down menu what is listed
sorry  open a terminal and type   aplay -l  and pastebin the readout
you dont actually have to uninstall pulseaudio  there are ways to deactivate it
but again I would wait for someone in #alsa to confirm this
